tool_description: Tracks HVAC parts inventory levels, manages stock alerts, and forecasts parts requirements for scheduled maintenance.

part_numbers.description: Array of part numbers to check

urgent_flag.description: Mark as urgent for priority handling

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: part_numbers and required_quantities arrays must have the same length.
Invalid part number: One or more part numbers not found in the inventory system.
Invalid quantity: All quantities must be positive integers greater than 0.
Invalid check date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and not more than 365 days in the future.
Invalid location preference: Use a valid warehouse location identifier.
usage: Provide part_numbers array with corresponding required_quantities array and check_date. Optionally specify location_preference and urgent_flag to get inventory status and availability.

inventory_status.description: Status for each part: available, low_stock, out_of_stock, on_order

available_quantities.description: Current available quantity for each requested part

estimated_delivery_dates.description: Estimated delivery dates for out-of-stock items

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all requested parts
